data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Antonio Nobre blows against Portimonense's Aylton Boa Morte for offside.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 3, Antonio Nobre signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Portimonense.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense's Fabricio has run offside.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In Guimaraes Portimonense attack through Pedro Sa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Antonio Nobre signals a Portimonense throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
In the minute 15, Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 16, Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Portimonense.
Antonio Nobre awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Silvio (Guimaraes) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 21, Antonio Nobre awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Free kick Guimaraes.
Guimaraes push forward at Dom Afonso Henriques and Jorge Fernandes gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Portimonense defence.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
In the minute 25, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Important block from the Portimonense defence as Andre Andre fires in a strike for Guimaraes.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 27, Abdul Mumin (Guimaraes) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 29, Lucas is booked for the away team.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Guimaraes.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Andre Andre.
That's a fine assist from Bruno Duarte.
In the minute 34, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Guimaraes.
In the minute 36, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Antonio Nobre signals a throw-in for Guimaraes, close to Portimonense's area.
In Guimaraes, Bruno Duarte (Guimaraes) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 37, Portimonense's Aylton Boa Morte is whistled for offside at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Portimonense.
In the minute 40, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Portimonense.
In the minute 43, At Dom Afonso Henriques, Pedro Sa has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Guimaraes push forward at Dom Afonso Henriques and Marcus Edwards gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Portimonense defence.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 49, Antonio Nobre signals a Portimonense throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
Portimonense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 57, Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Willyan Rocha is on a sub for Anderson de Oliveira da Silva for Portimonense.
Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a second substitution, with Ricardo Vaz Te replacing Pedro Sa.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Andre Almeida (Guimaraes) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 59, Portimonense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Guimaraes.
Ricardo Vaz Te for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 62, Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 64, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Henriques is making the team's first substitution at Dom Afonso Henriques with Miguel Luis replacing Andre Almeida.
In the minute 65, Guimaraes's Pepelu has been booked in Guimaraes.
Dener (Portimonense) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 68, Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guimaraes's half?
Antonio Nobre signals a Portimonense throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 68, Portimonense attack but Willyan Rocha's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
In the minute 69, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dener (Portimonense) has received a first yellow card.
Guimaraes drives forward and Rochinha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes make their second substitution with Ricardo Quaresma replacing Marcus Edwards.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jacob Maddox is replacing Rochinha for the home team.
In the minute 72, The away team replace Julio Cesar with Beto.
Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Guimaraes.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
Free kick Portimonense.
In the minute 75, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Ricardo Quaresma (Guimaraes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 80, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Quaresma is booked for the home team.
In the minute 83, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Andre Andre's header is off-target for Guimaraes.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 84, Willyan Rocha for Portimonense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Antonio Nobre awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 85, Luquinha is replacing Fabricio for Portimonense at Dom Afonso Henriques.
The away team have replaced Aylton Boa Morte with Welinton Junior. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paulo Sergio.
Portimonense are coming forward and Luquinha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Noah Jean Holm is on a sub for Bruno Duarte for Guimaraes.
Nicolas Janvier is replacing Andre Andre for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 88, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portimonense's Welinton Junior gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
Noah Jean Holm for Guimaraes is whistled offside.
Guimaraes needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Portimonense.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Miguel Luis for Guimaraes has been booked by Antonio Nobre and receives a first yellow card.
Willyan Rocha (Portimonense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
